【考法 1】 vt. 熄灭： to put out (a fire, for example); extinguish.
【例】 We thoroughly quenched the campfire before we headed to bed. 我们在睡前把营火完全熄灭了。
【近】 blanket, douse, put out, snuff out
【反】 fire, ignite, inflame, kindle, light 点燃
【考法 2】 v. 使满足： to put a complete end to (a physical need or desire)
【例】 this lemonade really quenches my thirst 这杯柠檬汁真是解渴
【近】 content, assuage, quench, sate, satiate, slake
【记】 q翻上来成d ,drench 湿透 就可以熄灭火；音:困池，将火围困到水池中以扑灭；通过drench (浸在水中)来灭火
The overturned cart ahead is a warning to the carts behind. 前车之覆，后车之鉴。
【另】 squelch 压制
